Workshop at ICRA 2021 about Legged Robots

Jun 19, 2021

Due to the covid-19 pandemic, our workshop on legged robots at ICRA 2021 was held online. You can find all talks of the workshop here:

Despite the challenge of having the workshop purely virtual, we managed to gather a large group of people.
